title.rendered: Real Madrid members can request a ticket for the Champions League final from the club until the 10th – Champions League

content.rendered:
Real Madrid will have 20,000 tickets for the Champions League final on March 28 to distribute among its members.

The form to purchase any of the tickets for the Stade de France is now available on the official website of Real Madrid. The only fundamental requirement to request it is to be a member of the club.

Season ticket holders will have to ask Real Madrid for tickets for the Champions League final, which will be distributed by lottery.

Once inside the private members area, each request can include from one to six locations. In any case, it will be mandatory to indicate the name and member number for which each request is made. And once all the fields have been filled in, Real Madrid assigns a number per request.

The deadline is May 10 at 11:59 p.m. On the 11th, Real Madrid will hold a draw by means of a notary public. A number will be drawn randomly and it will be the number from which requests start to be counted to where the tickets arrive.

Real Madrid warns: tickets are nominative

The tickets, as Real Madrid recalls, are nominative. It will pursue the resale and will have the measures it deems appropriate in case of reselling the tickets or making fraudulent use of them.

The club, as it did in previous editions, it is likely that a small percentage of the 20,000 seats that correspond to it will go to managers, players, employees, the VIP area, club commitments and members with more seniority. But it guarantees that 80% of the total will go to the draw among the requesting members.

?? Florentino Pérez congratulated the team for reaching the final.#APorLa14 | #RealMadridpic.twitter.com/DtDpNUsrva

– Real Madrid CF (@realmadrid) May 5, 2022

  • Left6:There is no advertising configuration for the requested slot
